entry.title: $2195 // 2BR IDEAL LOCATION NEXT TO PRATT INS. AT CLINTON HILL no fee
entry.content:
IDEAL LOCATED TWO bedrooms apartment full of character, that will ignite your creative side in those Brooklyn evenings. Featuring TWO bedroom with ample closet space. Natural soft light fill the high calling parlor, coming from the classic over-size windows.

HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED!!
FIRST AND SECURITY TO MOVE IN!

C S at Franklin Av 0.28 miles
G at Classon Av 0.32 miles

The best part is the LOCATION In The Heart of CLINTON HILL, NEXT TO PRATT INSTITUTION! short walk to the C S train station. One of New York City's most vibrant neighborhoods, CLINTON HILL is both sophisticated and urban known for its down-to-earth vibe. Ideal location next to the neighborhood bar/performance and chic coffee shops.

There is No Fee ! on the apartment.
To schedule a viewing please text or call show contact info David
Flexible move-in dates.
Guarantors Accepted.


HURRY - THIS ONE WON'T LAST!
